```function optimized_unknown!(du, u, p, t)
    U4_1 = @view u[4:end-1]
    U3_2 = @view u[3:end-2]
    U2_3 = @view u[2:end-3]
    U5_0 = @view u[5:end]
    U1_4 = @view u[1:end-4]
    dU12 = @view du[1:2]
    dUend = @view du[end-1:end]
    dUmid = @view du[3:end-2] 
    @. dU12 = zro_mat
    @. dUend = zro_mat
    @. dUmid = 1.0*((p[1]*U4_1.^3 - p[2]*U4_1.^2 + p[3]*U4_1 - p[4] 
                     - 2.0*(p[1]*U3_2.^3 - p[2]*U3_2.^2 + p[3]*U3_2 - p[4])
                     + p[1]*U2_3.^3 - p[2]*U2_3.^2 + p[3]*U2_3 - p[4])/dx2 
                    - 0.1*(U5_0 - 4.0*U4_1 + 6.0*U3_2 - 4.0*U2_3 + U1_4)/dx4)
end

pinit = [22.0, 28.0, 13.0, 0.7]

prob = ODEProblem(optimized_unknown!, u0, tspan, pinit)

function loss(p)
    tmp_prob = remake(prob,p=p)
    tmp_sol = solve(tmp_prob,CVODE_BDF(),saveat=tsteps)
    sum(abs2, Array(tmp_sol) - true_data)
end

function unknown_cb(p,l)
    @show l, p
    false
end

res = DiffEqFlux.sciml_train(loss,pinit,ADAM(0.1),cb=unknown_cb, maxiters=500)```

elements.text:
function optimized_unknown!(du, u, p, t)
    U4_1 = @view u[4:end-1]
    U3_2 = @view u[3:end-2]
    U2_3 = @view u[2:end-3]
    U5_0 = @view u[5:end]
    U1_4 = @view u[1:end-4]
    dU12 = @view du[1:2]
    dUend = @view du[end-1:end]
    dUmid = @view du[3:end-2] 
    @. dU12 = zro_mat
    @. dUend = zro_mat
    @. dUmid = 1.0*((p[1]*U4_1.^3 - p[2]*U4_1.^2 + p[3]*U4_1 - p[4] 
                     - 2.0*(p[1]*U3_2.^3 - p[2]*U3_2.^2 + p[3]*U3_2 - p[4])
                     + p[1]*U2_3.^3 - p[2]*U2_3.^2 + p[3]*U2_3 - p[4])/dx2 
                    - 0.1*(U5_0 - 4.0*U4_1 + 6.0*U3_2 - 4.0*U2_3 + U1_4)/dx4)
end

pinit = [22.0, 28.0, 13.0, 0.7]

prob = ODEProblem(optimized_unknown!, u0, tspan, pinit)

function loss(p)
    tmp_prob = remake(prob,p=p)
    tmp_sol = solve(tmp_prob,CVODE_BDF(),saveat=tsteps)
    sum(abs2, Array(tmp_sol) - true_data)
end

function unknown_cb(p,l)
    @show l, p
    false
end

res = DiffEqFlux.sciml_train(loss,pinit,ADAM(0.1),cb=unknown_cb, maxiters=500)

text: Here is part of the code, the ODE function has a finite difference for a 2nd a 4th derivative (the system is stiff) and the state vector has length 1001
